backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing admin access control, user profiles, and CRUD operations for property listings with persistent admin tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Guide describing how to retry deployment using dfx and pnpm.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme tokens and global CSS rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for main pages using SiteLayout as the root.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Admin panel UI for granting and revoking admin access using principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapAd: Helper UI explaining bootstrap admin access and allowing users to copy their principal ID.
frontend/src/components/auth/HomepageAut: Auth button that handles login/logout via Internet Identity with state-based text and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/MyPrincipal: Displays the user's principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button and temporary copied state.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfoBloc: Displays business name, address, and phone number using icons and theme styles.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Landing page hero section with headline, contact bar, auth button, and a featured image.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Inquir: Client-side inquiry form with validation, simulated submission, and success/error states.
Renders a list of inquiries with details or a placeholder when none exist.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContactBa: Contact/social links bar with compact and default variants using business and social metadata.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing business info, contact details, hours, and a branded copyright note.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, branding, compact contact bar, and conditional admin link based on identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper combining header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/properties/Inlin: A form component for creating or editing properties with support for image uploads, YouTube video links, and chunked video uploads.
frontend/src/components/properties/Prope: Displays a property with images, video, and admin controls, and allows inline editing via InlinePropertyForm.
A modal-based property editor for adding or updating properties with fields for text and images.
An image carousel component with error handling and navigation for property images.
Renders a grid of PropertyCard items or an empty-state message when no properties exist.
frontend/src/data/siteData.ts: Contains static business info, social links, and seed property data definitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on user identity, handling authentication and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Fetches backend admin diagnostics and environment context, handling admin list and status with graceful fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Provides grant and revoke admin mutation hooks with error normalization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoPlayba: Loads and exposes a direct video URL from an ExternalBlob with simple loading and error state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Uploads a video file as an ExternalBlob with progress tracking and basic validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Returns an empty inquiry list placeholder since backend inquiry support is removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Synchronizes a state value with localStorage with safe JSON handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePropertyListings.t: Provides property listing queries and create/update/delete mutations with error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Checks caller admin status using the backend, refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with authentication, admin checks, diagnostics, and inquiry management.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main landing page with marketing sections and an inquiry form prompt.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Shows a standalone inquiry submission page with a form.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Lists properties and provides admin-only create, update, and delete operations.
frontend/src/README-content-transfer.md: Instructions for exporting site content and migrating business data and images to Google Sites.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines simple frontend-only types for user profiles and inquiries.
frontend/src/types/propertyVideo.ts: Provides video type detection for YouTube URLs, uploaded blobs, or none.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts an image File to a data URL with validation and size checks.
frontend/src/utils/icError.ts: Normalizes canister errors into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/src/utils/videoFileToDataUrl.ts: Converts a video File to a data URL without size limits.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Provides utilities to extract YouTube video IDs from multiple URL formats and generate embeddable URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with additional plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, and state for adding a specific principal ID to the backend admin list.
